thread.title: This silver blue hair is giving us straight up winter vibes
thread.title_full: This silver blue hair is giving us straight up winter vibes

author: Rachel Charlene Lewis
title: This silver blue hair is giving us straight up winter vibes
text:
This silver blue hair is giving us straight up winter vibes One of our favorite trends to take over in the last few years is the grey hair trend. And then the denim hair trend totally took over in 2016, which made our hearts sing! We were so pumped when we figured out how to dye our hair blue with ease ! Now, 2017 is bringing major winter vibes thanks to the silver blue hair trend. It’s a killer combination of both, and it couldn’t be more stunning!
Honestly, this silver blue hair look is an absolute dream come true. A video posted by Hair Makeup Nails Beauty (@hotforbeauty) on Jan 6, 2017 at 7:37pm PST 
We’re getting major space vibes from this absolutely gorgeous style in the *best* way! A photo posted by Salon De Paris (@lydia_grosso_) on Jan 6, 2017 at 10:16pm PST 
Oh, our hearts. We just love this so much! A photo posted by Balayage By Alyssa (@balayagewithalyssa) on Jan 3, 2017 at 2:36pm PST 
The metallic undertones to silver blue hair make it a definite favorite of ours. A video posted by Umud Qasımov (@umud.qasimoff) on Nov 2, 2016 at 9:38am PDT 

Whether you go long or short, this is a must-try look. A photo posted by Salon De Paris (@lydia_grosso_) on Dec 29, 2016 at 11:10am PST 
We dig this slight ombre. Why not mix things up?! A photo posted by Alice Lcb (@alice.lcb) on Dec 22, 2016 at 2:56pm PST 
Or go a little more intense by really stepping up the blue tint. A photo posted by Jenny Lor (@jennnspirations) on Dec 4, 2016 at 2:46am PST 
Either way, it’s going to be truly stunning. A video posted by P R E P H A I R (@mandistrands) on Nov 16, 2016 at 7:03am PST 
TG for this totally unexpected trend! A photo posted by Sara Dahl (@dahl_hairs) on Jan 7, 2017 at 11:45am PST 
Here’s to taking on more creative looks in the new year!
